Posts.Content: Hi  My hair started falling out after my second cycle of FEC so my husband clipped it to number 3, then a week later to 0.. Last week end he shaved it all off as it was like sleeping on a hair brush at night. I am not so brave as to answer the door without a scarf or hat on yet.  I didnt go in for a wig at all as one of my fears is it blowing off while out and about.  A hat coming off doesnt seem so bad strangely. I also used Annabandana but found that that the bandanas rubbed my ears and back of the neck where the elastic was a bit stiff so mostly use hats now. I have loved reading all your comments and hope that mine will be useful for anyone else out there Brenda
Posts.Title: Hair falling out.

Posts.Content: HI THERE EVERYONE HAPPY NEW YEAR AND HOPE YOU ALL HAD A GOOD CHRISTMAS I HAVE NOT BEEN ON HERE FOR AGES AND AGES.  I FINISHED MY RADIOTHERAPY ON 12 NOVEMBER AND HAVE BEEN TO SEE THE RADIOTHERAPY ONCOLOGIST AND ALL SEEMS TO BE OK APART FROM MY BREAST IS STILL A BIT PINKISH AND THERE IS A SLIGHTLY HARD LUMP WHICH I HAVE BEEN TOLD TO MASSAGE DAILY WITH SOME MOISTURISER. I SHOULD BE SEEING THE OTHER ONCOLOGIST IN APPROX 4TH MONTHS TIME WILL I BE TOLD THEN THAT I AM CLEAR OR DO THEY NOT ACTUALLY TELL YOU THAT FOR A NUMBER OF YEARS  I AM ON LEXOTROLE FOR 5 YEARS NOT TAMOXIFEN BECAUSE I AM POST MENAPAUSAL. ANYWAY IAM GOING TO BE A GRANDMOTHER IN APRIL MY FIRST GRANDCHILD AND MY HUSBAND AND I ARE LOOKING FORWARD TO THAT.  ALSO LOADS OF 50TH BIRTHDAYS TWO 80THS ONE DIAMOND WEDDING ANNIVERSAY AND MY 60TH TOWARDS THE END OF THE YEAR SO A VERY BUSY YEAR AHEAD IAM DISAPPOINTED THAT MY HAIR IS NOT GROWING BACK AS QUICKLY AS I WOULD LIKE BUT I SUPPOSE THAT I HAVE TO GRATEFUL THAT IT IS COMING BACK  MY EYEBROWS ARE A BIT SPARSE AS WELL I AM THINKING OF HAVING THEM TINTED WILL CLOSE NOW ALL THE VERY BEST TO YOU ALL BRENDA
Posts.Title: end of treatment

Posts.Content: HI EVERYBODY OUT THERE.  SAW MY SURGEON YESTERDAY AND GOOD NEWS  THERE ARE NO CANCEROUS CELLS AROUND THE MARGINS OF THE BREAST TISSUE TAKEN WHEN I HAD MY LUMPECTOMY TWO WEEKS AGO AND ALTHOUGH THEY TOOK 3 LYMPH NODES THE OTHERS ARE OK.  SHE WAS VERY PLEASED WITH THE WAY MY BREAST IS HEALING AFTER NIPPLE WAS RE ALIGNED ETC.  HUSBAND SAID IT WAS THE BEST 10 MINS OF HIS LIFE  ALL GOOD NEWS  JUST THE RADIOTHERAPY TO GO  HAVE STARTED TAKING LEXOTOLE TODAY NOT SURE IF THAT IS HOW YOU SPELL IT  IM UPSTAIRS AND TABS DOWNSTAIRS  CAN ANYONE TELL ME HOW SOON AFTER YOUR LAST CHEMO HAIR WILL START TO GROW BACK PROPERLY  I HAVE VERY WISPY FINE FAIR GROWING ON THE SIDES OF MY HEAD NOTHING ON THE TOP AT ALL  AS MY HAIR IS USUALLY   THIN ON TOP ANYWAY I AM HOPING IT WONT GET ANY THINNER  I HAVE READ THAT THE HORMONE TABLET I AM ON COULD MAKE HAIR THINNER ANYWAY WHICH IS THE LAST THING I WANT REALLY  I WONDER IF I COULD HAVE A WAYNE ROONEY TYPE HAIRPLANT ON THE NHS MY BIG TOENAILS SEEM TO HAVE STOPPED LIFTING  I MIGHT NOT LOSE THEM NOW  WILL JUST WAIT AND SEE  THEY DONT LOOK PARTICULARLY NICE THO  WONT PAINT THEM YET SO I CAN SEE WHAT IS HAPPENING TO THEM  THE OTHER TOE NAILS ARE OK THO THEY DO LOOK BRUISED  MY FINGER NAILS ARE OK  THEY WERE TENDER BUT THAT IMPROVED  MY NEICE IS GOING TO GIVE ME A NICE MANICURE AT THE WEEKEND  LOOKING FORWAD TO THAT WELL WILL GO NOW AND HAVE A NICE CUP OF TEA ALL THE BEST TO EVERY ONE HERE BRENDA
Posts.Title: results from surgery

Posts.Content: HI THERE  WELL SINCE I LAST POSTED ON HERE MY FINGERNAILS HAVE STARTED TO LIFT  ITS ONLY HAPPENING ON THREE NAILS AT THE MOMENT BUT I THINK THAT I CAN SEE SIGNS ON FIVE MORE  WHAT A BUGGER  I CAN ONLY KEEP PUT NAIL STRENGTHENER ON AND HOPE THAT WILL HELP TO PROTECT THEM  I THOUGHT THAT AS 7 SEVEN WEEKS HAD PASSED SINCE LAST CHEMO I HAD PASSED THE WORST  NOT TO TO BE I SUPPOSE I HAD TO GO AND HAVE SOME FLUID DRAINED FROM UNDER MY ARM ON FRIDAY  WHEN I SAW THE SIZE OF THE NEEDLE I THOUGHT I WAS GOING TO PASS OUT BUT IN FACT HARDLY FELT A THING AS I AM STILL A BIT NUMB UNDER THERE  NURSE TOOK ABOUT 250MLS BUT IT DID FEEL BETTER AFTERWARDS BUT I THINK IT FILLING UP AGAIN  DOES ANYONE KNOW IF YOU ARE ON DALTAPARIN JABS THIS AFFECTS THE REGROWTH OF HAIR  ONE OF THE SIDE AFFECTS IS ALOPECIA AND I WAS WONDERING IF THIS DELAYS HAIR GROWTH  I AM STILL OMLY GETTING THE WISPY BABY HAIR AT THE SIDES OF MY HEAD CANT SEE THE BACK SO DONT KNOW WHATS HAPPENING THERE  I HAVE BEEN TOLD THAT MY EYELASHES AR E GROWING BUT THEY ARE VERY FAIR AS WELL IAM SEEING MY GP THIS WEEK TO DISCUSS COMING OFF THE JABS AS I HAVE BEEN ON THEM NOW FOR 5 MONTHS ON THE WAY HOME FROM HOSPITAL AFTER THE FLUID DRAINING WE WERE HIT UP THE BACK WHILE WAITING AT TRAFFIC LIGHTS  NO DAMAGE DONE BUT IT ALL MAKES FOR AN EVENTFUL DAY I SUPPOSE SHALL GO NOW GOOD LUCK TO EVERYONE ON HERE BRENDA
Posts.Title: hair regrowth and fingernails

Posts.Content: DID YOU PAINT YOUR NAILS WITH DARK VARNISH  I DID AND MY FINGERNAILS ARE OK AT THE MOMENT.  MY TOENAILS ARE A DIFFERENT STORY THOUGH.  I DIDNT PAINT THEM QUICK ENOUGH AND MY BIG TOENAILS HAVE LIFTED AND I DID GET AN INFECTION UNDER ONE WHICH TOOK TWO LOTS OF ANTIBIOTICS TO CLEAR  THEY HAVENT QUITE COME OFF COMPLETELY BUT WILL PROBABLY SOON I EXPECT.  LIKE CORRINE MY FINGERNAILS HAVE GONE VERY RIDGY AND DRY AS WELL SO I AM TRYING TO MOISTURISE THEM AS MUCH AS POSS. I AM GOING TO TRY SOME HAIR NAIL AND SKIN VITS TO SEE IF THEY WILL HELP
Posts.Title: losing fingernails!

Posts.Title: losing fingernails!

Posts.Content: Hi there saw my new consultant at my local hospital on Thursday  What a lovely lady.  Went through everything with her.  The side effects from the first Docetaxol were classic  has prescribed more steroids for a few extra days and also upped the pain killers.  My lump is hormone receptive so will be on hormone therapy for 5 years after radiotherapy.  hormone may affect bone density so will also be on vit d and calcium tablets.  Examined breast and had difficulty finding a 2cm lump. There was a slight thickening but not much else.  This will hopefully mean a smaller op but there are lymph nodes to be removed and also glands under the collar bone.  I am to see surgeon on 6th July and surgery should take place hopefully 4 weeks after last cycle which is on 8th July.  all in all a positive appointment. Now just waiting for side effects to kick in tomorrow.  Only one more cycle to go tho All the best to everyone on here  Will be back
Posts.Title: new consultant
